message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take a bit more considering the inflation affects me less.
Let's split it evenly, Alice.  We can both get a decent amount before the inflation eats away at our gains.
I understand you want an even split, but the inflation hurts you more than me. This offer still gives you a good chunk.
Alice, I'm willing to compromise a bit more.  How about we split it 4500/5500?  That way we both get a good amount before things get worse.
